comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Sweden before 1945, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 32697310@N05
comment._content:
i´m thinking about how different is our world today... they didnt have tv, radio, telephone, internet!
also all the memories of my greatgrandmother  when i was a kid so tasteful and  "homemade"... beau photo....
